sequence:
My Fond Memories

<size=45>Chapter 3: The Secretary Ship's Responsibilities</size>

scripts.say: Commander. Here are the itinerary and exercise schedules that have been planned for the day, along with the situation reports from each sea zone patrol.

Also, here is the tally of the school's equipment, the inventory of our raw materials, the acquisition requests from the shop, the list of commissions entrusted to us, the progress of uniforms being manufactured, and the inventory of the blueprint storehouse.
And submission of the observation data of Sirens to the higher-ups, maintenance of mental cubes, and what’s left is the organization of Her Highness Elizabeth’s public assistance program...
As stated in the report, everything is progressing without any issues.
Right, this concludes today's duties as the secretary ship. Commander, thank you for your hard work.
Hehe~ I am merely doing the work of a Secretary Ship. Feel free to sit back and relax, Commander.
... You'll be making dinner and tomorrow's breakfast, won't you? As well as handling the cleaning?
Tomorrow I'm off-duty, so I’m going shopping with Achilles. I’d like for it to be earlier than usual.
Though Ajax was able to perform her duties as a secretary ship flawlessly, there was one glaring characteristic about her work...
And that was - she was unable to properly do anything that remotely fell under the category of "chores."
Are you dissatisfied? Even if I'm like this, I believe that I am properly handling my duties as secretary ship.
Or, could it be that you intend to make me do these chores, Commander?
Hehe~ I'm alright with doing just a liiittle bit, but... my evaluation of you will drop, Commander.

You're aware that you may ask a member of the maid team for help if needed, right? Of course, only if you're not satisfied with simply pushing chores onto your secretary ship, but also want to make a pass at one of the maids... Oh you~♪
You'd happily do something like that, wouldn't you? Little piggy~♪
